lore: Gorpin is the ultimate fan of Imp Impington Reborn. His dedication is so intense that the False God rewarded him with cybernetic enhancements, improving his physical abilities. Gorpin serves his master unconditionally, doing whatever is necessary, though his main tasks involve cleaning his lair and cooking extravagant meals that could rival any top-tier chef.
